description: Protectors of Obscuria who live in harmony with the canyon's mysteries. Monster Rangers scout, survive, and defend using wit, wilderness skills, and mystical bonds with the creatures they befriend.
weapons_note: Unit costs include standard-issue weapons. Weapon abilities and properties are defined in core rules. Upgradeable weapons (like Harpoons) have additional point costs listed in optional_upgrades.
universal_upgrades_note: All Monster Ranger units may purchase universal upgrades: Gas Mask (3pts), Witch-Stitched Armor (10pts), and Pocket Snacks (5pts - faction universal befriending). Some units have built-in protection and cannot purchase Gas Mask (Doom Mime, Brine Diver, Monster Medic, Skull Ranger, Scareforce Rattlekite). Brine Diver and Cargo Tiger Truck cannot purchase Witch-Stitched Armor. Doom Mime, Brine Diver, and Cargo Tiger Truck cannot purchase Pocket Snacks.

faction_features.name: Befriend Monsters
faction_features.effect: Monster Rangers can befriend monsters using Pocket Snacks (contested Quality rolls) or specialized befriending abilities. Befriended monsters activate with Rangers.

faction_features.name: Branch System
faction_features.effect: Rangers belong to different Branches (Crow, Conjure Guard, Doom Mime, Signal, Skull, Yokai, etc.) which grant thematic abilities and playstyles.

faction_features.name: Diverse Specialists
faction_features.effect: Monster Rangers field incredible variety: stealth scouts, mystic casters, medics, mechanics, psychics, undead caretakers, titan specialists, flying daredevils, and more.

units.name: Core Ranger
units.lore: Field-trained Monster Ranger infantry from the land branches. Signature tool: hatchet, equal parts weapon and working tool.
units.tactics: Baseline skirmisher. Thrown hatchets for short-range pressure, finish in melee. Pairs with Conjure Guard (Shield Aura) and Monster Medics (healing).
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Gas Mask, Witch-Stitched Armor, Pocket Snacks

optional_upgrades.name: Gasmask
optional_upgrades.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.name: Cargo Tiger Porter
units.lore: Hard-working Rangers who run Cargo Tiger shipping company. Months on road made them deadly accurate with slingshots - out-range most Rangers despite Q1.
units.tactics: Backline harassment with 12" slingshots (longest range!). Grab objectives with Load & Carry, escape with Cut and Run, extract for VP.
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Gas Mask, Witch-Stitched Armor, Pocket Snacks

optional_upgrades.name: Gasmask
optional_upgrades.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.name: Crow Ranger
units.lore: First Ranger Branch, masters of stealth and trickery. Scouts of the Monster Rangers. Realm is stealth.
units.tactics: Fast scout (8" move from Rogue Fast). Stealth keeps safe at range. Climber for high ground. Fastest manling unit.
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Gas Mask, Witch-Stitched Armor, Pocket Snacks. Rogue type grants: Fast (+2 Move), Stealth (cannot be targeted beyond 12" unless attacking), Climber (ignore vertical terrain)

optional_upgrades.name: Gasmask
optional_upgrades.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.name: Clocktalker Mechanic
units.lore: Monster Ranger mechanics who maintain equipment and befriend mechanical monsters. Heavy wrenches can repair or crush.
units.tactics: Support specialist. Repair Cargo Tiger Trucks and constructs. Befriend mechanical monsters. Tough(1) for survivability.
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Gas Mask, Witch-Stitched Armor, Pocket Snacks

optional_upgrades.name: Gasmask
optional_upgrades.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.name: Conjure Guard
units.lore: Mystic protectors who focus on Witch Stitches - systematic warding using thread and needle. Understand we are deeply linked like thread.
units.tactics: Position centrally for Shield Aura (+1 Defense to allies within 6"). Hex debuffs enemies (-1 Quality). Witch Stitching ward (5+ ignore first damage per activation).
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Fire Hat, Gas Mask, Witch-Stitched Armor, Pocket Snacks

optional_upgrades.name: Fire Hat
optional_upgrades.effect: Replace Shield Aura and Hex with Blast(2) and Fear(1). Become offensive fire caster.

optional_upgrades.name: Gasmask
optional_upgrades.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.name: Dark Librarian
units.lore: Study, catalog, and protect Monster Ranger knowledge. Arcane repositories of legends, stories, Formulae. Motto: 'You are what you know.'
units.tactics: Backline support. (1) Purify hazardous terrain (8" radius, once per game), (2) Boost befriend vs chosen monster type (+1 die within 12"), (3) Amplify Conjure Guards (extend range/area +6"/+3").
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Gas Mask, Witch-Stitched Armor, Pocket Snacks

optional_upgrades.name: Gasmask
optional_upgrades.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.name: Monster Medic

abilities.name: Built-In Respirator
abilities.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.lore: Treat Monster and Manling alike. Med Kits contain as many poisons as medicines. Brew VitaGood, perform blood transfusions. Some wear crow masks.
units.tactics: Each turn: Blood Transfusion (base contact, sacrifice 1Q to heal 1Q, or 2Q for monsters - RISKY!) OR Venom (6" poison). VitaGood tokens (2) for recovery or emergency heal.
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Witch-Stitched Armor. Crow Mask built-in (no Gas Mask needed). Cannot use Pocket Snacks.

units.name: Psychic Ranger

abilities.name: Befriend Spirits
abilities.effect: May attempt Befriend against Bloodless with the Ghost or Haunt keyword. Does not apply to physical undead.

units.lore: Pierce the BEYOND with Third Eye. Create Fortuna Charms (luck), project consciousness to control minds. Rare and vital. Motto: 'Seeing is Believing.'
units.tactics: Support specialist. (1) Fortuna Charms: 3 tokens for rerolls, (2) Third Eye: see Stealth/reveal hidden, (3) Mind Control: attack to control enemy's next activation.
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Gas Mask, Witch-Stitched Armor, Pocket Snacks

optional_upgrades.name: Gasmask
optional_upgrades.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.name: Yokai Ranger
units.lore: Specialize in Yokai and Kaiju. Started 1909 when Baron Davis visited Osaka. 5000+ Yokai Rangers in Japan. Regimented scholarly approach. 'Kaiju Corps' - ultimate Titan specialists.
units.tactics: Titan specialist. Befriend Titans with +2 dice (Q3+2 = 5 dice vs Q6!). Kaiju Calming Ritual: 2-turn ritual to shrink rampaging Kaiju for +3 VP. Yokai Knowledge: +1 die aura vs Titans.
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Gas Mask, Witch-Stitched Armor, Pocket Snacks

optional_upgrades.name: Gasmask
optional_upgrades.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.name: Scareforce Rattlekite

abilities.name: Built-In Goggles
abilities.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.lore: Blappo invention - canvas wings, firework propulsion, daredevil pilots. They only land... or crash. Erratic flight makes hard to hit (D3 from speed). Glorious death trap!
units.tactics: High-speed bomber. Fly over enemies dropping flechettes (automatic hits!). MUST move 6"+ or risk crash. When destroyed, crashes spectacularly (AoE damage).
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Witch-Stitched Wings, Firework Bombs, Pocket Snacks. Flight goggles built-in (no Gas Mask needed).

optional_upgrades.name: Witch-Stitched Wings
optional_upgrades.effect: +1 Defense (D3→D4), Barely Controlled test succeeds on 3+ instead of 4+. More stable bomber.

optional_upgrades.name: Firework Bombs
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: Drop firework bomb. Blast(3), Fear(1). Spectacular explosive!

units.name: Doom Mime

abilities.name: Built-In Respirator
abilities.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.lore: Secret police of Monster Rangers. Masked enforcers. Fixers, advisors who 'deal with' problems. Invite-only. Know 100 ways to make you cry with steel batons. Metal Mask built-in.
units.tactics: Pressure engine (Brute role). Stealth + Fear(2) creates board denial. Commits to combat, grinds enemies down. Makes bad decisions unavoidable.
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Witch-Stitched Armor. Metal Mask functions as built-in Gas Mask (no purchase needed). Cannot use Pocket Snacks.

units.name: Brine Diver

abilities.name: Built-In Respirator
abilities.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.lore: Deep sea divers in heavy pressure suits. The suit is their temple - rarely removed. Sea Rangers adapted to deep pressure. Electro-tridents crackle with AP energy.
units.tactics: Front-line tank. D5 + Tough(2) = 6 effective wounds (9-12 attacks to kill!). AP(1) cuts armor. Slow (4") but unstoppable. Park on objectives.
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Harpoons, Witch-Stitched Armor. Cannot purchase Gas Mask (Pressure Sealed). Cannot use Pocket Snacks.

optional_upgrades.name: Harpoons
optional_upgrades.effect: Gain Ranged 10" attack. 14" total threat range (4" move + 10" range). Trained hunters.

units.name: Relic Guardian
units.lore: Field officers of Dark Librarians. Proven worthy to carry sacred Conjure Guard relics. Bonded to relic, sworn to protect it. Bring artifacts to critical moments.
units.tactics: Hero game-changer. Choose ONE relic (included in cost). Save for perfect moment. 10 relic options: control, utility, terrain, anti-monster, survival, morale break.
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Gas Mask, Witch-Stitched Armor, Pocket Snacks. CHOOSE ONE RELIC (included in 160pt cost).

optional_upgrades.name: Groom's Grail
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: 12" cone freeze all units hit (no Move/Attack) for 2 rounds. Mass disable.

optional_upgrades.name: Alune's Shovel
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: Create 10" thorn wall (Hazardous, blocks LOS). Battlefield control.

optional_upgrades.name: Blink Crown
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: Swap positions with any creature on table. Ultimate repositioning.

optional_upgrades.name: Gravewarden Bell
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: 8" aura Shaken, already Shaken become Panicked. Mass morale break.

optional_upgrades.name: Saltbound Reliquary
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: 6" radius, Monsters/Undead suffer 1 damage, no morale recovery 2 rounds. Anti-supernatural.

optional_upgrades.name: Widow's Lantern
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: 10" aura for 2 rounds - enemies lose Stealth/cover. Counter-stealth.

optional_upgrades.name: Iron Psalm Nails
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: Anchor single enemy at 12" (no Move/reposition) for 2 rounds. Lock down.

optional_upgrades.name: Roluun's Mask
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: 8" enemy morale test - fail = Broken (instant rout).

optional_upgrades.name: Thurible of Crawling Smoke
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: Place 5" smoke cloud at 12" (blocks LOS, Hazardous) for 2 rounds. Terrain creation.

optional_upgrades.name: Pact Mirror
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game: Redirect all damage from Guardian to unit within 6". Ultimate survival.

optional_upgrades.name: Gasmask
optional_upgrades.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.name: Signal Ranger
units.lore: Messengers and flag-bearers. Lead Calamity Parades, use Radio technology. Some jam Monsterology Dynamo equipment. First: Ivan Kularak, Trolla with 19ft banner pole!
units.tactics: Standard leader (Inspire +1 die, Rally morale). Save Calamity Parade for decisive moment (+3" Move, +1 Quality, Fearless for 1 round, 6" aura). Radiomancer Jam disrupts tech heroes (24", jam Jagers/Haxans/Iron Diplomats).
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Gas Mask, Witch-Stitched Armor, Pocket Snacks

optional_upgrades.name: Gasmask
optional_upgrades.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.name: Skull Ranger

abilities.name: Built-In Respirator
abilities.effect: Immune to gas, smoke, poison, and airborne hazard effects.

units.lore: Ancient sect (500+ years). Care for Bloodless: Haunts, Vampires, Embalma, Rotters. Founded by Joh Woefix. Cemetery caretakers. Only wear black, smell like earth, see beauty in death.
units.tactics: Durable undead specialist (D3 + Tough(2) + Fearless = 6 wounds!). Befriend Bloodless (contested vs undead). Haunt Candy tokens (3): buff, heal, or reroll befriend. Thrice-Blessed Shovel with Brutal Blow.
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Witch-Stitched Armor, Pocket Snacks. Skull Deathmask built-in (no Gas Mask needed).

units.name: Cargo Tiger Truck
units.lore: Cargo Tiger shipping company - nation's first motorized freight (1903). 27 trucks, 88 wagons, 1 steam engine. Can burn Thyr crystals for boosts. Hard-working Rangers drive into battle.
units.tactics: Fast platform (10" Move!). Load Rangers/objectives for transport. Park for Mobile Cover (+1 Defense aura). Grapple enemies (pull 3"). Thyr Boiler (once per game): +4" Move OR +2 Quality OR ignore terrain.
units.upgrades_note: May purchase: Reinforced Cab, Extra Storage, Spare Thyr Crystals. Vehicle cannot use Pocket Snacks, Gas Mask, or Witch-Stitched Armor.

optional_upgrades.name: Reinforced Cab
optional_upgrades.effect: +1 Defense (D4→D5), -1" Move (10"→9"). Armored plating.

optional_upgrades.name: Extra Storage
optional_upgrades.effect: Increase capacity: +2 Rangers OR +1 objective. Total: 6 Rangers OR 3 objectives.
